forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening envelops Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere shimmers with a softness ushered in by the gentle embrace of partly cloudy skies. A refreshing chill lingers in the air, inviting one to snuggle into layers as the temperature settles around a tranquil 53 degrees. A leisurely west-southwest breeze rustles through the streets, its whisper occasionally rising to a spirited gust, hinting at the playfulness of the coastal winds. 

Tomorrow dawns with promises of clarity, the sun unfurling its warm rays over the city, reaching a comfortable high of 66 before retreating gently in the afternoon. As the day unfolds, it beckons one outdoors to savor the vibrant energy of urban life. With the marine layer creeping in from the west, there is a subtle presence of fog on the horizon, but true visibility remains largely unhindered, adding a touch of mystique to the Golden Gate Bridge. In this delightful weather, a stroll along the waterfront could be rewarding, perhaps with a warm cup at hand. Alternatively, a visit to one of the city's less frequented parks could offer a peaceful escape, allowing one to bask in the gentle morning light. 

As dusk rolls in tonight, the air will call for a light jacket but may still allow for a summery feel, lending itself to casual gatherings and evening walks. The cityscape remains an inviting embrace for those wishing to explore the serene yet vibrant essence of San Francisco.
